AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqAIX72GE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for AIX72: Checks whether AIX version is greater than or equal to 7.2.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-2.3, AIX7.2-2.4, and AIX7.2-2.5 (Level 1): Maintaining the system integrity by detecting, removing and protecting against known types of malicious software.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_brokenlinks
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-2.7 (Level 1): Remove Unused Symbolic Links.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_groupwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-3.4 (Level 1): Remove group write permission from default groups - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_stickybit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-3.5 (Level 1): Application Data with requirement for world writable directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_worldwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-3.6 (Level 1): Ensure there are no world writable files - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_staffwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-3.7 (Level 1): Ensure there are no 'staff' writable files - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_ownerless
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-3.8 (Level 1): Ensure all files and directories are owned by a user (uid) and assigned to a group (gid).

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uninstallCDE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.1 (Level 1): De-install CDE.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermdtaction
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.5 (Level 1): Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtaction.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermdtappgather
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.5 (Level 1): Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtappgather.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermdtprintinfo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.5 (Level 1): Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtprintinfo.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermdtsession
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.5 (Level 1): Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtsession.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_cde_savertimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.5.1.7: CDE - screensaver lock.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_cde_locktimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.5.1.7: CDE - screensaver lock.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_cde_labelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.5.1.8: CDE - login screen hostname masking.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.labelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_cde_perslabelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.5.1.8: CDE - login screen hostname masking.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.persLabelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.9 (Level 1): Set the read-only group and other permissions for /etc/dt/config/Xconfig.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.9 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:bin for /etc/dt/config/Xconfig.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.10 (Level 1): Set the read-only group and other permissions for /etc/dt/config/Xservers.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.10 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:bin for /etc/dt/config/Xservers.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.11 (Level 1): Set permissions for /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.1.11 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.2.1 (Level 1): Disable root access to ftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ftpbanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.2.2 (Level 1): Set an ftp login banner which displays the acceptable usage policy.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ftpd_noworldaccess
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.2.3 (Level 1): FTPD - prevent world access and group write to files.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshversionv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.1 (Level 1): Minimum version is 8.1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.2 (Level 1): Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_shosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.3 (Level 1): Remove any existing .shosts files from all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_banner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.6 (Level 1): sshd_config: Banner exists and message contains Only authorized users allowed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_hostbasedauthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.7 (Level 1): sshd_config: HostbasedAuthentication is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_ignore_rhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.8 (Level 1): sshd_config: IgnoreRhosts is yes or shosts-only.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_permit_empty_passwords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.9 (Level 1): sshd_config: PermitEmptyPasswords is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_log_level
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.10 (Level 1): sshd_config: LogLevel is INFO or VERBOSE.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_sftp_server_args
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.11 (Level 1): sshd_config: sftp-server arguments include -u 027 -f AUTH -l INFO.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: MULTIPLE Subsystem "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l INFO" "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l DEBUG" /etc/ssh/sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_max_auth_tries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.12 (Level 1): sshd_config: MaxAuthTries is 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_permit_user_environment
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.13 (Level 1): sshd_config: PermitUserEnvironment is no.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_kex_algorithms
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.15 (Level 1): sshd_config: KexAlgorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_ciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.16 (Level 1): sshd_config: Ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_macs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.17 (Level 1): ssh_config: MACs - Message Authtification Codes.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sshd_rekey_limit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.3.18 (Level 1): ssh_config: ReKeyLimit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sendmail_sgm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.1 (Level 1): Hide sendmail version information.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sendmail_po
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.2 (Level 1): Ensure that PrivacyOptions includes at least authwarnings, noexpn, and novrfy.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sendmail_dpo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.3 (Level 1): Ensure that sendmail in MTA mode supports only local applications that require legacy MTA.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.4 (Level 1): Set the ownership root for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownclientmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.5 (Level 1): Set the ownership smmsp for /var/spool/clientmqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermclientmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.5 (Level 1): Set the permissions ug=rwx,o= for /var/spool/clientmqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.6 (Level 1): Set the ownership root for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.4.6 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,go= for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uninstallsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.6 (Level 1): Uninstall snmp and snmpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uninstallsendmail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.5.7 (Level 1): Uninstall sendmail.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.6.1 (Level 1): Specifies the time interval (30 seconds) to type in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.6.2 (Level 1): Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 10 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.6.4 (Level 1): Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 5, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.6.3 (Level 1): Adds a default herald to /etc/security/login.cfg.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_homedirs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.1 and AIX7.2-4.7.1.2 (Level 1): Home directory must exist and Home directory must be owned by account, or special account.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermhome
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.3 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.4 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:audit for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rs,o= for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_securitydirsperms
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.5 (Level 1): SECURITY Subsystems: /etc/security.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermvaradmrasdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.6 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/ras/*.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.7 (Level 1): Set the ownership adm:adm for /var/adm/sa.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.7 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,go=rx for /var/adm/sa.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermcrontabsdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.8 (Level 1): Set the permissions o= for the children objects of /var/spool/cron/crontabs recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chowncrontabs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.8 (Level 1): Set the group cron for all /var/spool/cron/crontabs directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermpath
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.9 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all the directories in root user PATH environment variable.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_roothomedir
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.10 (Level 1): Ensure root user has a dedicated home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.11 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:audit for all /etc/security/audit directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.11 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for/etc/security/audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsecurityauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.1.11 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /etc/security/audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsubmitcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.1 (Level 1): New configuration file for sendmail /etc/mail/submit.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_find_setuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.2 (Level 1): Verify Trust of suid, sgid, acl, and trusted-bit files and programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rootcrnjobck
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.3 (Level 1): Make sure the permissions of all the root crontab entries are owned and writable by the root user only.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermhomeconf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.4 (Level 1): Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user configuration files in each home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsmitlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.5 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /smit.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chowngroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.6 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:security for /etc/group.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.6 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/group.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chperminetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.7 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/inetd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chowninetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.7 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:system for /etc/inetd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.8 (Level 1): Set the ownership bin:bin for /etc/motd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.8 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/motd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.9 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:security for /etc/passwd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.9 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/passwd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsshconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.10 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/ssh/ssh_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsshdconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.11 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=rw,go= for /etc/ssh/sshd_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chownatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.12 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /var/adm/cron/at.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.12 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/at.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chowncronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.13 (Level 1): Set the ownership root:sys for /var/adm/cron/cron.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermcronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.13 (Level 1): Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/cron.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermRMstartlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.14 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/ct/RMstart.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermcronlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.15 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/cron/log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermdpid2log
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.16 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/dpid2.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermhostmibdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.17 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/hostmibd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chpermsnmpdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.7.2.18 (Level 1): Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/snmpd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rmdotfrmpathetcenv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.11 (Level 1): Removes the dot from the PATH variable in /etc/environment file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user bin.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locksys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user sys.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user adm.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user uucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locknobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user nobody.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locklpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user lpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locklp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user lp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockinvscout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user invscout.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_lockipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user ipsec.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locknuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user nuucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_locksshd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.12 (Level 1): Lock historical user sshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.13 (Level 1): Remove current working directory from root's PATH.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.1.1 (Level 1): Specifies the number of weeks before a password can be reused to 52.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.1.2 (Level 1): Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.1.3 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_hashedpasswords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.2 (Level 1): All accounts must have a hashed password.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_checkuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.3 (Level 1): Ensure all users have a unique UID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_checkgid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.1.4 (Level 1): Ensure all groups have a unique GID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_policy4all
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.1 and AIX7.2-5.2.4 (Level 1): Ensure password policy is enforced for all users.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_pwdalgorithm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.2 (Level 1): Set the system password algorithm to a stronger cryptographic hash algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_nocrypt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.3 (Level 1): Ensure passwords are not hashed using 'crypt'.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.5 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum length of a password to 14 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.6 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of characters that were present in the previous password that cannot be used in the new password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.7 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.8 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.2.9 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.2-5.2.10 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.2-5.2.11 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.2-5.2.12 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7.2-5.2.13 (Level 1): Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.1 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.1 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.2 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.2 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_logindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.3 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rlogindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.3 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.4 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user guest to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.4 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user guest to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.5 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.5 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.6 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.6 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginnuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.7 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user nuucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginnuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.7 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user nuucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.8 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.8 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_loginuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.9 (Level 1): Set local login (login) for user uucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rloginuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.9 (Level 1): Set remote login (rlogin) for user uucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uidftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.3.10 (Level 1): Add all users with a UID less than 200 to /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.6 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-5.7 (Level 1): Specifies the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_writesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.1: Comment the entry for writesrc in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_blocktalksrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.2: Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_blockwritesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.2: Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_dt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.3: Comment the entry for dt in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_piobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.4: Comment the entry for piobe in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_qdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.5: Comment the entry for piobe in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rcnfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.1.6: Comment the entry for rcnfs in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uninstallcasagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.1.1.7 (Level 1): Uninstall cas_agent.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_inetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.1: Disable inetd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_aixmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.2: Disable aixmibd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_dhcpcd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.3: Disable dhcpcd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_dhcprd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.4: Disable dhcprd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_dhcpsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.5: Disable dhcpsd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_dpid2
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.6: Disable dpid2 daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_gated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.7: Disable gated daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_hostmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.8: Disable hostmibd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_mrouted
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.9: Disable mrouted daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_named
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.10: Disable named daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_portmap
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.11: Disable portmap daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_routed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.12: Disable routed daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rwhod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.13: Disable rwhod daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sendmail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.14: Disable sendmail daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_snmpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.15: Disable snmpd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_snmpmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.16: Disable snmpmibd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_timed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.2.17: Disable timed daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ndpdhost
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.3.2: Disable ndpd-host daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ndpdrouter
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.3.3: Disable ndpd-router daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_uninstallNFSclient
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.1.4.1 (Level 1): NFS - de-install NFS client

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disableNFSsuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.1.4.3 (Level 1): NFS - enable both nosuid and nodev options on NFS client mounts

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_disableNFSlocal
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.1.4.4 (Level 1): NFS - localhost removal

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rootsquashNFS
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.1.4.6 (Level 1): NFS - no_root_squash option.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_bootps
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.1: Comment the entry for bootps service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.2: Comment the entry for chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.3: Comment the entry for comsat service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.4: Comment the entry for daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.4: Comment the entry for daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_discard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.5: Comment the entry for discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.6: Comment the entry for echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.6: Comment the entry for echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_exec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.7: Comment the entry for exec service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_finger
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.8: Comment the entry for finger service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.9: Comment the entry for ftp service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_imap2
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.10: Comment the entry for imap2 service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_instsrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.11: Comment the entry for instsrv service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_klogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.12: Comment the entry for klogin service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_kshell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.13: Comment the entry for kshell service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.14: Comment the entry for rlogin service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.15: Comment the entry for netstat service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.16: Comment the entry for ntalk service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.17: Comment the entry for pcnfsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_pop3
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.18: Comment the entry for pop3d service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rexd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.19: Comment the entry for rexd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.20: Comment the entry for rquotad service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.21: Comment the entry for rstatd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ruserd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.22: Comment the entry for ruserd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.23: Comment the entry for rwalld service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.24: Comment the entry for shell service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.25: Comment the entry for sprayd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_xmquery
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.26: Comment the entry for xmquery service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.27: Comment the entry for talk service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.28: Comment the entry for telnet service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.29: Comment the entry for tftp service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.30: Comment the entry for time service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.30: Comment the entry for time service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_uucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.1.5.31: Comment the entry for uucp service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.1: Set the value of the network option clean_partial_conns to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.2: Set the value of the network option bcastping to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_directedbcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.3: Set the value of the network option directed_broadcast to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_icmpaddrmask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.4: Set the value of the network option icmpaddressmask to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.5: Set the value of the network option ipforwarding to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipignoredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.6: Set the value of the network option ipignoredirects 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.7: Set the value of the network option ipsendredirects 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.8: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouteforward 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.9: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouterecv 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.10: Set the value of the network option ipsrcroutesend 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.11: Set the value of the network option ip6srcrouteforward 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_nfsusereservedports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.12: Set the value of the network option nfs_use_reserved_ports 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.13: Set the value of the network option nonlocsrcroute 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_sockthresh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.14: Set the value of the network option sockthresh 60.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tcppmtudiscover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.15: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmty_discover 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.16: Set the value of the network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_udppmtudiscover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.17: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmty_discover 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ip6forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.2.18: Set the value of the network option ip6forwarding 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rootsu
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting su attribute to true.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by disabling console login for root.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by disabling remote login for root.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_rootsugroups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.9 (Level 1): Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting sugroups attribute to SUADMIN.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_corelimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.10 (Level 1): Core Dumps: Set the core limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_corehardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.10 (Level 1): Core Dumps: Set the core_hard limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_disfullcore
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.10 (Level 1): Core Dumps: Set the fullcore kernel parameter to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_chketcmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-4.14 (Level 1): Create a /etc/motd file which displays, post initial logon, a statutory warning message.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 3.3: Ensure default umask is 027 or more restrictive.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_limitcissysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendations AIX7.2-6.4 and AIX7.2-6.6 (Level 1): Review the current at/cron files and add any relevant users to the /var/adm/cron/at.allow and /var/adm/cron/cron.allow files.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_flrt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 7.2: Install flrtvc tool.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.3.1: Ensure that IP Security is available.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsecloopbk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.3.2: Ensure loopback is blocked on external interfaces.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv2_ipsecfilter
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation 4.3.3: Ensure filters are active.
